com.facebook.buck.event.listener.stats.cache

Class NetworkStatsTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.event.listener.stats.cache.NetworkStatsTracker

  • public class NetworkStatsTracker
extends Object
    Tracks network related events and maintains stats about uploads/downloads/cache rate/etc.
